CustomField.description: Used in "Reunion Confirmed Practitioner" email templates.
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Delivery_Type__c, "Physical"), IF(ISBLANK(Venue__c), "Thank you for agreeing to facilitate the " + TEXT( Course__r.Sub_Type__c ) + " reunion. All the confirmed clients on the course have now received a reunion confirmation email." + "They have been informed that the reunion will be held on " + Day_of_Week__c + " " + TEXT(Date__c) + " from " + Start_Text__c + " to " + End_Text__c + " and that you will confirm the venue with them nearer the time." + BR() + BR() ,
"Thank you for agreeing to facilitate the " + TEXT( Course__r.Sub_Type__c ) + " reunion. All the confirmed clients on the course have now received a reunion confirmation email." + "They have been informed that the reunion will be held on " + Day_of_Week__c + " " + TEXT(Date__c) + " from " + Start_Text__c + " to " + End_Text__c + " at: " + BR() + BR() + Venue_Address__c + HYPERLINK(Location_Map_Url__c, "Click here to see this on a map") + BR() + BR() )
, "")
CustomField.label: Reunion Physical Practitioner Message
